features: Super Wrinkle Remover: Compared with ordinary hand-held steam boilers, this clothes steamr boiler has professional functions and the most powerful 1500W power supply. Through the latest upgrade of the new nozzle, powerful power and powerful steam function, more than 80% of the steam can be thoroughly penetrated into the hard-to-reach fabric area to remove peculiar smell. Based on the function, it can prevent water leakage, safe and reliable, and easily restore your favorite clothing

High Definition LCD Screen Clothes Steamer Heating in 20 Seconds: New smart clothes steamer is currently the most powerful hand-held clothes steamer, preheating within 20 seconds, Press the LCD screen to produce strong steam. Remove unhealthy substances on the surface of the clothing, with a unique high-definition smart LCD display, which can clearly see the heating mode and whether the heating is completed

Portable and Ideal Travel Steamer: This clothing steamer, hand-held steamer, is light and easy to move and use, very suitable for travel and business. The water tank can hold up to 300ml, which can provide better full steam and extend the working time of up to 20 minutes, reducing the trouble of frequent water addition and saving you time. When the steamer temperature is too high or the water level is too low, it will automatically shut down to ensure your safety

Handheld Steamer for Clothes and Curtains: LCD smart garment steamer has 2 steam modes to choose from. The first-level steam is suitable for removing most of the wrinkles, and the unique second-level steam mode can produce a more powerful steam burst, which can thoroughly penetrate the fabric and smooth the hardest wrinkles, so as to achieve the best ironing effect. The 8-in-1 multifunctional steamer is suitable for any fabric, such as cotton, wool, linen, sequins, beads, embroidery, etc

Perfect and Thoughtful Gift: This steamer is a good choice as a gift for family and friends. The high-quality clothing steamer will satisfy your family and friends.Steamer has cables and is 60 inches long.This specification is only available in the US.

How to Use: Step1,Add water;Step2,Plug in the power supply and touch the power switch on the LCD display.Wait for 30 seconds. When the switch stops flashing, it means that the preheating is complete.Step3,Touch the LCD display and select steam;Step4,Turn the lock mist button on the front of the garment steamer to release steam all the time;Step5,After ironing, press and hold the power button for 2 seconds. The indicator light will go out and the device will stop working.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful hand-held fabric clothing steamer. The high-definition intelligent LCD screen saves ironing time and is a must-have product for an efficient life. Exclusive 1500 watt steam flow provides hot steam and produces results quickly. The newly optimized 300ml water tank can provide sufficient steam and can provide up to 15 minutes of cooking time. Notice:Our new steamer is a water pump heating type. During heating, it is normal to make a sound. Please wait for a few seconds and the steam will be released.It is normal for the steamer to make noise during the heating process!Don’t worry!

Unique 2 Mode Ironing Option The LCD display shows the heating mode at a glance, and the power light is always on to indicate that heating has been completed.Garment steamer has 2 wrinkle removal options.You can easily select the steam mode that better suits your needs by pressing the LCD screen, ensuring you can safely use it on the most delicate fabrics such as satin, nylon, cotton, wool, linen , embroidery, etc. The first level removes most wrinkles. The second stage creates a more powerful burst of steam that thoroughly penetrates the fabric and smooths out the toughest creases.

Will not leak The handheld clothes steamer adopts the latest nozzle design to ensure it will not leak or spill. You can use it at any angle,Can be used both horizontally and vertically whether you want to steam clothes hanging horizontally or vertically. 1500W Powerful Wrinkle Removing Steamer This handheld clothes steamer has powerful 1500W power and can preheat in 15S, removing wrinkles from clothes faster Portable Compact Size Travel Steamer This handheld steamer for clothes features a durable 8ft/200mm cable, measures 12×7×1.5 inches, 3.3 lbs,handheld compact size design, lightweight, storage bag included,easy to move and use.

Q:Why steamer is not producing the steam? Step 1：Add water, do not exceed the maximum water level of the water tank; Step 2: Plug in the power supply and touch the power switch on the LCD display. When the switch keeps flashing, it means that it is preheating. Wait for 30 seconds. When the switch stops flashing, it means that the preheating is complete. Step 3: Touch the LCD display and select steam; Step 4: Turn the lock mist button on the front of the garment steamer to release steam all the time; Step 5: After ironing, press and hold the power button for 2 seconds. The indicator light will go out and the device will stop working. Our new steamer is a water pump heating type. During heating, it is normal to make a sound. Please wait for a few seconds and the steam will be released. Specification: Powerful power: 1500w Safety voltage: 120V Fast heating: 15 seconds Large water tank: 300ml 2 Steam mode: medium or high, you can choose when removing deep or fine wrinkles. Compact size: 11.7in*8.7in, exquisite design, ideal for travel and business.

How to Use our Upgraded Garment Steamer? Step 1：Add water, do not exceed the maximum water level of the water tank; Step 2: Plug in the power supply and touch the power switch on the LCD display. When the switch keeps flashing, it means that it is preheating. Wait for 30 seconds. When the switch stops flashing, it means that the preheating is complete. Step 3: Touch the LCD display and select steam; Step 4: Turn the lock mist button on the front of the garment steamer to release steam all the time; Step 5: After ironing, press and hold the power button for 2 seconds. The indicator light will go out and the device will stop working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice weight & size
reviews.reviewText: My last steamer was big & bulky. This steamer is very manageable & easy to use. It works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know how I went this long without a steamer. I’ve had this one for months now and it has worked perfectly. Heats up quick, doesn’t leak, and steams really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great steamer. It is pretty powerful for the price. I have been pleased with how well it gets out wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with it, easy to use, good results fast. Good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great steamer, holds a good amount of water
reviews.reviewText: We use this weekly for steaming wrinkles out of clothing and other items. It has been serving us well. We only use distilled water in it, to prolong the life, as regular water contains mineral deposits which can gum up the inner workings of the unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would save me from taking out the ironing board and iron. It didn’t get the wrinkles out like I would have liked and I found it heavy. Too heavy to travel with, for sure. Also the on off button didn’t work and made it frustrating to get the thing going. Many have said it is great for them. but not so in my view. I returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets Hot Very Quickly !
reviews.reviewText: It simply works as Advertised period. Not Much to say here . Nice easy to use Contraption ! Just keep some Water ready to pour in it . Since it Steams Extremely Well it uses a decent am-out of water. Not Excessively. The same as the Next Good Steamer. Or good iron that steams well ;-) You can and will get through a Steaming Session with 1 Fill Up..Other than that you now have what you need to make a Conscious Decision on this purchase. So do just that…. Purchase !! ;-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkles free in no time
reviews.reviewText: Steams out all wrinkles in no time. This works better thsn my expensive stamp up steam

A little miracle worker. Good quality item. Super Easy to fill and use . Almost no leakage, just crushing through my wrinkled shirts lol gets about 80-90% of wrinkles out with steam alone, recommend steam glove to smooth out clothes better with the iron. Only negative is the top stem gets very hot on one side close to where you hold the device and they should insulate it more under the plastic.
Love this! I use it for my bedding and sheets and it works wonderful. Heats up very fast.

This steamer does an excellent job. We washed 2 sets of curtains but they wrinkled and to get them pressed at a dry cleaner was more expensive than buying this machine. They were a thicker material so we used the higher setting and it did a fantastic job and we tested the lower setting on a few of my wifes blouses and sweaters and again it did a great job. The only reason I gave a 4 star is because when steaming the curtain and keeping the unit level the steam escapes downward so it burns your hand so to avoid that you have to tip the unit backwards so the steam goes up and away from your hands. Other than that it's a great unit and I highly recommend it
Pour des chandails et un manteau été

The media could not be loaded. The preheat light blinks, but it's never ready to go. In the video you can see that for more than 2:30 minutes the preheat light continues to blink, but it does not heat to use it. It is for this reason that I want to return this product and get a full refund of the money I paid for it.
